title: Best deal, studio includes heat/hot water and 1 pkg photos avail
posting_body: Great deal, near Amory Park, walk to
B and C lines, Boston University,
This unit has a dishwasher and disposal.
Hardwood floors, laundry facilities and heat
Available August 1 or 15th, no pets or smoking.
Good credit and monthly income needed approx.
Faster connection if you call me.
There is a real estate fee of $1,900.
Leave me your email address for photos.
Please reference: Studio Brookline in your text or message Thank you
